mapper.select: SELECT QnA_no, user_info_user_no, QnA_title, QnA_text, QnA_category, answer_detail, answer_yn, QnA_create_datetime, answer_create_datetime FROM inquiry_qna WHERE QnA_no=#{QnA_no}

SELECT QnA_no, user_info_user_no, QnA_title, QnA_text, QnA_category, answer_detail, answer_yn, QnA_create_datetime, answer_create_datetime
FROM inquiry_qna WHERE user_info_user_no=#{user_info_user_no} ORDER BY QnA_no ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inquiry_qna (user_info_user_no, QnA_title, QnA_text, QnA_category, answer_detail, answer_yn, QnA_create_datetime) VALUES (#{user_info_user_no}, #{QnA_title}, #{QnA_text}, #{QnA_category}, null, 'N', now() );
mapper.update: UPDATE inquiry_qna SET answer_detail=#{answer_detail}, answer_yn=#{answer_yn}, answer_create_datetime=now() WHERE QnA_no = #{QnA_no};
